QuestData.Title: Magic Decoder Device
QuestData.Description:
We retrieved this device from the sethrak in the ruins to the east, but have not been able to use it.
When you approached, it started to glow. Something about you...
<Maaz pauses and eyes the stone on your neck.>
...or on you... is waking it up!
Please, $c, use the scepter and examine the statues of the Keepers, in the central courtyard of the ruins. Something there got their overseer very excited.
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Keeper statues in the ruins.
